title: Summary
text:
Software engineer with 9+ years experience.
Proficient in JS, TS, Node, React, Python.
Focus on performance optimization.

title: Typeface (2023–Present)
text:
Reduced bundle size by 65%.
Enhanced search with vector system.
Won company hackathon 2024.

title: Houzz (2021–2023)
text:

Developed unified search results page.
Improved page load performance.

title: Yahoo (2017–2021)
text:

Optimized report generation by 50%.

title: Dcard (2013–2015)
text:

Doubled page views with enhanced UI.
Drove 10x user growth with new features.
